description: Australia all-rounder Ellyse Perry and stand-in captain Alyssa Healy are ruled out of The Hundred due to injuries.
title: The Hundred 2023: Ellyse Perry and Alyssa Healy ruled out of competition through injury
title_page: The Hundred 2023: Ellyse Perry and Alyssa Healy ruled out of competition through injury - BBC Sport
maintext: Coverage: Ball-by-ball commentary on every game on BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra, BBC Radio 5 Live and BBC Sounds. Live text updates alongside in-play video clips, contributions from a Hundred super-fan community and all the best stats on the BBC Sport website and app. Sixteen games live on BBC Two and BBC iPlayer. More details.
